edu.ncsu.csc216.get_outdoors.model

Class ActivityList

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • edu.ncsu.csc216.get_outdoors.model.ActivityList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tabular, java.util.Observer

    public class ActivityList
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer, Tabular
    An ActivityList has a SortedArrayList of Activity.
    Author:
    mchoi@ncsu.edu, jballie@ncsu.edu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ActivityList()
      Constructs the edu.ncsu.csc216.get_outdoors.util.SortedArrayList and sets numActivities to 0.

    • Constructor Detail

        public ActivityList()

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name field.
        Returns:
        name of the activity list

      • addActivity

        public boolean addActivity(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String description,
                           boolean needSnow,
                           int snowBoundary)
        Returns true if the Activity is added to the list and false otherwise. The method constructs a Activity using the provided parameters and creates a unique id for the activityID using the numActivities as described above. The Activity is added to activities so that the list is always sorted by Activity name. Observers of ActivityList are notified of the change if the Activity is added to activities. You will not be able to use Collections.sort() for this method.
        Parameters:
        name - to set
        description - to set
        needSnow - to set
        snowBoundary - to set
        Returns:
        true if activity has been added

      • getActivityAt

        public Activity getActivityAt(int idx)
        Returns the Activity at the given index in the activities list. If the index is less than 0 or the index is greater or equal to size() an IndexOutOfBoundsException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        idx - of the activity
        Returns:
        Activity at given index

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the number of Activity objects in the activities list.
        Returns:
        int size of the Activity list

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns true if the activities list is empty and false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if empty

      • get2DArray

        public java.lang.Object[][] get2DArray()
        Returns an Object[][] array. Each row, i, contains an Activity. [i][0] is the Activity activityID, [i][1] is the Activity name, [i][2] is the Activity description, [i][3] is the Activity needSnow, and [i][4] is the Activity snowBoundary.
        Specified by:
        get2DArray in interface Tabular
        Returns:
        Object[][] contains activity

      • indexOfID

        public int indexOfID(java.lang.String id)
        Returns the index of the first occurrence of a Activity that has an exact match to the provided id or -1 if there are no Activity objects with an exact match on the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - to look up
        Returns:
        int index of the requested Activity with given id

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable ob,
                   java.lang.Object obj)
        If a Activity in the Activity List changes, the update() method is automatically called. Activity List should propagate the notification of the change to its Observers IF the Observable o is contained in the activities list. The arg parameter is passed to notifyObservers().
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Parameters:
        ob - of Observable pattern
        obj - element to update
